text: Rare is a video game developer. Their headquarters is in England. In 2002, Microsoft bought Rare with a price of 3.75 billion.微软3.75亿美元收购英国游戏开发商Rare .2002-09-25.比特网.[2013-06-23] Former employees of Rare have established their own companies, including Free Radical Design, renowned for creating the TimeSplitters series, and Playtonic Games, known for Yooka-Laylee (2017). == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Video game companies of the United Kingdom Category:Companies of England
title: Rare
